channel.title: Hobby on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Hobby on PR

item.title: Instagram Challenge - 2019
item.description:
Year after year, I see so many gifted people share their art during month of October tagged #inktober

Guess what, I wanted to join last year and I did. I challenge myself to post one photo each day of October and I successfully completed that. ~90% of them are without any edits except cropping or minor color corrections.

item.title: My Raspberry Pi Collection
item.description: I’ve always been interested in Raspberry Pi. I pre-ordered, waited for about 3+ months and even paid Customs (ridiculous amount) to import my very first Pi.
